languages.text: {n}Тонкие губы Хротко растягиваются в улыбке.{/n} "Благодарю за высокую оценку. Рад, что смог продемонстрировать вам свою полезность, пусть и при таких... необычных обстоятельствах". {n}Хротко вежливо улыбается вам, совершенно не глядя на перекошенную от ненависти Иокасту.{/n}

{n}Hrotko's lips stretch into a thin smile.{/n} "Thank you for your high praise. I am grateful to have had this opportunity to prove my usefulness to you, albeit under... unusual circumstances." {n}Hrotko remains unfailingly polite and completely ignores the seething Sauerback.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Тонкие губы Хротко растягиваются в улыбке.{/n} "Благодарю за высокую оценку. Рад, что смог продемонстрировать вам свою полезность, пусть и при таких... необычных обстоятельствах". {n}Хротко вежливо улыбается вам, совершенно не глядя на перекошенную от ненависти Иокасту.{/n}

I am glad to have been able to demonstrate my usefulness to you, albeit under such... unusual circumstances." {n}Hrotko remains unfailingly polite and completely ignores the seething Jocasta.{/n}

{n}Hrotko's lips stretch into a thin smile.{/n} "Thank you for your high praise. I am grateful to have had this opportunity to prove my usefulness to you, albeit under... unusual circumstances." {n}Hrotko remains unfailingly polite and completely ignores the seething Sauerback.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hrotko verzieht die Lippen zu einem schmalen Lächeln.{/n} "Danke für Euer Lob. Ich freue mich, dass ich Euch meine Nützlichkeit beweisen konnte, wenn auch unter ... ungewöhnlichen Umständen." {n}Hrotko bleibt betont freundlich und ignoriert die vor Wut schäumende Sauerback.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Hrotko's lips stretch into a thin smile.{/n} "Thank you for your high praise. I am grateful to have had this opportunity to prove my usefulness to you, albeit under... unusual circumstances." {n}Hrotko remains unfailingly polite and completely ignores the seething Sauerback.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hrotko verzieht die Lippen zu einem schmalen Lächeln.{/n} "Danke für Euer Lob. Ich freue mich, dass ich Euch meine Nützlichkeit beweisen konnte, wenn auch unter ... ungewöhnlichen Umständen." {n}Hrotko bleibt betont freundlich und ignoriert die vor Wut schäumende Sauerback.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les lèvres de Hrotko s'étirent en un sourire.{/n} « Vos compliments me touchent. Je suis reconnaissant d'avoir pu vous prouver mon utilité, bien que les circonstances sont pour le moins... inhabituelles. » {n}Ignorant délibérément Jocasta qui bouillonne intérieurement non loin, Hrotko demeure infailliblement poli.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Hrotko's lips stretch into a thin smile.{/n} "Thank you for your high praise. I am grateful to have had this opportunity to prove my usefulness to you, albeit under... unusual circumstances." {n}Hrotko remains unfailingly polite and completely ignores the seething Sauerback.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les lèvres de Hrotko s'étirent en un sourire.{/n} « Vos compliments me touchent. Je suis reconnaissant d'avoir pu vous prouver mon utilité, bien que les circonstances sont pour le moins... inhabituelles. » {n}Ignorant délibérément Jocasta qui bouillonne intérieurement non loin, Hrotko demeure infailliblement poli.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los labios de Hrotko se estiran hasta esbozar una fina sonrisa.{/n} «Le agradezco los elogios. Me complace haber tenido una oportunidad para demostrarle mi utilidad, aunque haya sido en circunstancias... extraordinarias». {n}Hrotko permanece indefectiblemente cortés e ignora por completo la expresión iracunda de Sauerback.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Hrotko's lips stretch into a thin smile.{/n} "Thank you for your high praise. I am grateful to have had this opportunity to prove my usefulness to you, albeit under... unusual circumstances." {n}Hrotko remains unfailingly polite and completely ignores the seething Sauerback.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los labios de Hrotko se estiran hasta esbozar una fina sonrisa.{/n} «Le agradezco los elogios. Me complace haber tenido una oportunidad para demostrarle mi utilidad, aunque haya sido en circunstancias... extraordinarias». {n}Hrotko permanece indefectiblemente cortés e ignora por completo la expresión iracunda de Sauerback.{/n}

languages.text: {n}フロトコの唇が笑みの形に引き伸ばされる。{/n}「高い評価をいただき、ありがとうございます。渡しの有用性を証明するためにこのような機会をいただけたことに感謝していますよ。まあ...特殊な状況下ではありますが」{n}フロトコは動揺するザウアーバックを完全に無視し、一貫して礼儀正しい態度を崩さずにいる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Hrotko's lips stretch into a thin smile.{/n} "Thank you for your high praise. I am grateful to have had this opportunity to prove my usefulness to you, albeit under... unusual circumstances." {n}Hrotko remains unfailingly polite and completely ignores the seething Sauerback.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}フロトコの唇が笑みの形に引き伸ばされる。{/n}「高い評価をいただき、ありがとうございます。渡しの有用性を証明するためにこのような機会をいただけたことに感謝していますよ。まあ...特殊な状況下ではありますが」{n}フロトコは動揺するザウアーバックを完全に無視し、一貫して礼儀正しい態度を崩さずにいる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}赫洛卡咧开嘴，露出了笑容。{/n}“感谢您对我的期许，大人。我很感激能有这个机会，向您证明我是个有用的人，尽管……是在如此不同寻常的情况下。”{n}赫洛卡始终保持着彬彬有礼的态度，完全无视了气急败坏的苏尔贝克。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Hrotko's lips stretch into a thin smile.{/n} "Thank you for your high praise. I am grateful to have had this opportunity to prove my usefulness to you, albeit under... unusual circumstances." {n}Hrotko remains unfailingly polite and completely ignores the seething Sauerback.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}赫洛卡咧开嘴，露出了笑容。{/n}“感谢您对我的期许，大人。我很感激能有这个机会，向您证明我是个有用的人，尽管……是在如此不同寻常的情况下。”{n}赫洛卡始终保持着彬彬有礼的态度，完全无视了气急败坏的苏尔贝克。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hrotko'nun kıvrılan dudaklarında incecik bir gülümsemeye beliriyor.{/n} "Takdiriniz için teşekkür ederim. Her ne kadar... Alışılageldik koşullar altında olmasa da size ne kadar faydalı olacağımı kanıtlayabileceğim bu fırsattan dolayı minnettarım." {n}Hrotko, kibarlığını kusursuz bir şekilde koruyarak öfkeden köpüren Sauerback'i tamamen yok sayıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Hrotko's lips stretch into a thin smile.{/n} "Thank you for your high praise. I am grateful to have had this opportunity to prove my usefulness to you, albeit under... unusual circumstances." {n}Hrotko remains unfailingly polite and completely ignores the seething Sauerback.{/n}
